snippet: The possibility of including Japan in the regional agreement gave the deal heft, but it also brought complaints from carmakers in the United States.
abstract: Japan and United States agree on deal that paves way for Japan to join talks on an Asia-Pacific free trade agreement; move increases economic weight of proposed pact and brings loud protest from American automakers.
lead_paragraph: The possibility of including Japan in the regional agreement gave the deal heft, but it also brought complaints from carmakers in the United States.

headline.seo: U.S. Puts Japan in Talks for Pacific Trade Deal
headline.main: U.S. Puts Japan in Talks for Pacific Trade Deal
headline.print_headline: Japan in Deal To Join Talks On Trade Pact
